div.p: I am interested in working with, you know, Year 7, 8 and 9 in a similar role that I’m doing now because I think if you’re working with the
younger young person then you might have more of a chance of helping them be successful and achieving by the time they’re 15
because obviously you’ve tried to implement and instil things from a younger age instead of waiting until they’re 15 and 16
and just, you know, more things will be available to them and because they’re at a younger age they’ll probably have less inhibitions
and will try new things, you know, so it’s an exciting prospect, I guess, working with younger ones.
